009package imagingbook.common.geometry.fitting.circle.algebraic;
010
011import static imagingbook.common.math.Arithmetic.isZero;
012
013import imagingbook.common.geometry.basic.Pnt2d;
014import imagingbook.common.geometry.circle.AlgebraicCircle;
015import imagingbook.common.geometry.circle.GeometricCircle;
016
017public abstract class CircleFitAlgebraic {
018        
019        public enum FitType {
020                KasaOrig,
021                KasaA,
022                KasaB,
023                Pratt,
024                Hyper,
025                Taubin
026        }
027        
028        public static CircleFitAlgebraic getFit(FitType type, Pnt2d[] points) {
029                switch (type) {
030                case Hyper:     return new CircleFitHyper(points);
031                case KasaA:     return new CircleFitKasaA(points);
032                case KasaB:     return new CircleFitKasaB(points);
033                case KasaOrig:  return new CircleFitKasa(points);
034                case Pratt:     return new CircleFitPratt(points);
035                case Taubin:    return new CircleFitTaubin(points);
036                default: return null;
037                }
038        }
039        
040        /**
041         * Returns the parameters (A, B, C, D) of the algebraic circle
042         * A (x^2 + y^2) + B x + C y + D = 0.
043         * @return the algebraic circle parameters (A, B, C, D)
044         */
045        public abstract double[] getParameters();
046        
047        public GeometricCircle getGeometricCircle() {
048                double[] q = this.getParameters();      // assumed to be (A, B, C, D)
049                if (q == null || isZero(q[0])) {        // (abs(2 * A / s) < (1 / Rmax))
050                        return null;                    // return a straight line
051                }
052                else {
053                        return GeometricCircle.from(new AlgebraicCircle(q));
054                }
055        }
056        
057}
